member.name: T:TradeBotAPI.Models.Broker
member.summary: Represents an intermediary that executes buy and sell orders, among other tasks.

member.name: T:TradeBotAPI.Models.Holding
member.summary: Contains details about the stocks owned by the user. A holding is an executed buy operation.

member.name: M:TradeBotAPI.Models.Holding.ToString
member.summary: Returns a text representation of the object.

member.name: T:TradeBotAPI.Models.Market
member.summary: This class contains information about the available formal markets where stock trading is enabled

member.name: T:TradeBotAPI.Models.Operation
member.summary: Represents a buy or sale operation.

member.name: P:TradeBotAPI.Models.Operation.Tax
member.summary: The tax is the same everywhere (in a country)

member.name: P:TradeBotAPI.Models.Operation.Commission
member.summary: The commission depends on the Broker.

member.name: T:TradeBotAPI.Models.Portfolio
member.summary: Helps to admin the stocks holdings owned by the user.

member.name: T:TradeBotAPI.Models.Stock
member.summary: Represents a stock, an investment instrument. Stocks represents the right to collect a part of the earnings of a Company.

member.name: M:TradeBotAPI.ExtensionMethods.IntExtensions.ToInt(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to convert the string to int. If it can't do it, will return 0 (valid int).

member.name: M:TradeBotAPI.ExtensionMethods.IntExtensions.ToFloat(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to convert the string to float. If it can't do it, will return 0 (valid float).
